main.title: Documentaries
main.description: Comprehensive business and legal representation of all aspects of documentary production from early stages of development, through fundraising, production, principal photography, post-production and distribution
services: Reviewing, negotiating and drafting agreements for underlying rights, including life story and other rights that are the subject matter of the documentary
Drafting and negotiating all above and below the line agreements
Structuring, negotiating, advising on and drafting financing agreements
Advising on and vetting of audiovisual content for all the necessary clearances and fair use analysis with Opinion Letter
Assistance with acquiring Errors & Omissions insurance coverage with fair use riders on the best terms
Reviewing and negotiating all domestic and international distribution and pre-sale agreements for any and all media rights

main.title: Television
main.description: Comprehensive business and legal representation during all stages of the creative process for producers, writers, talent executives, performers, directors and celebrity personalities working in all forms of television and streaming including:
services: Network development agreement, Network production financing agreements, Network production services agreements
Production counsel during development and production, including domestic and foreign access agreements, and co-production agreements
Securing intellectual property rights and obtaining all required clearances
Contracts, licenses and releases for all talent and above the line crew
Music licenses
Resolving Guild disputes, including the SAG/AFTRA, WGA and DGA
Distribution, licensing, including derivative productions

main.title: Film
main.description: Business and Legal representation during the full cycle of motion picture production for feature films, independent films and shorts including:
services: Securing underlying intellectual property rights
Assistance with business plans and budgets
Structuring, negotiating and drafting financing agreements
LLC operating agreements, and Blue Sky state securities filings
Domestic and international co-production agreements
Drafting and negotiating contracts for writers, producers, directors, composers, cast and all crew
Music licenses
Vetting of screenplays and film footage for all the necessary clearances and fair use analysis with Opinion Letter writing to qualify for Errors & Omissions insurance coverage with fair use riders
Resolving and mediating disputes including Guild disputes with WGA, SAG, or DGA
Reviewing and negotiating domestic and international distribution, licensing, and merchandising agreements
